paragraphs.context: Some of the best phones for gaming include the Asus ROG Phone 5, Nubia Red Magic 6, iPhone 12 Pro Max, Samsung Galaxy S21 Ultra, and OnePlus 9 Pro. Some of the best foldable phones available include the Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 2, Samsung Galaxy Z Flip, Huawei Mate X2, Xiaomi Mi Mix Fold, and Royole FlexPai 2. Some of the phones with the longest battery life include the Asus ZenFone 7, Samsung Galaxy M51, Moto G Power (2021), Xiaomi Poco X3 NFC, and Samsung Galaxy A72. Some of the best phones for people with hearing impairments include the iPhone 12 Pro Max, Samsung Galaxy S21 Ultra, Google Pixel 5, OnePlus 9 Pro, and Sony Xperia 1 II.

qas.question: which kind of phones are suitable for gaming

answers.text: Moto G Play (2021), Nokia 2.4, Samsung Galaxy A01, LG K40, and Xiaomi Redmi 9A
